# SocialToast DMS - Frontend App

## Project Overview
A Progressive Web App (PWA) for a Document Management System with secure and scalable document storage on the cloud.

## Tech Stack
- **Framework**: Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS + DaisyUI
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **PWA**: next-pwa

## Development Guidelines
- Use App Router pattern with server and client components
- Follow React best practices with functional components and hooks
- Use DaisyUI components for consistent UI design
- Implement responsive design for all screen sizes
- Ensure accessibility standards are met
- Use TypeScript for type safety

## Project Structure
```
src/
├── app/           # Next.js App Router pages
├── components/    # Reusable UI components
├── lib/           # Utility functions and helpers
├── hooks/         # Custom React hooks
├── types/         # TypeScript type definitions
└── styles/        # Global styles
```

## Commands
- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run start` - Start production server
- `npm run lint` - Run ESLint
